Name: Rigoleto Montecucco Rosso
Wine Description: A pleasant red with notes of fresh red berries. Medium-bodied with elegance and spiciness. Clean and fruity with a pure mineral note.

Name: Garnacha
Wine Description: This wine has a remarkably complex nose, with balsamic aromas, redolent of black fruit, roasted notes and a very good structure in the mouth.

Name: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Classico
Margaux
Wine Description: Lightly firm dusting of cocoa, offering crushed plum and fig fruit flavors, with a perfumy espresso edge chiming in on the medium-weight finish. Ripe spicy fruit aromas. Very pure, ripe fruit flavours. Succulent, spicy, well made.

Name: Mountain Red
Wine Description: Spicy aromas of black pepper and mulberry mingle with the plum flavours of this soft and approachable wine.

Name: Gigondas Bellecoste
Winery: Domaine de la Solitude - Famille Lancon

Name: Estate Sta. Rita Hills Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Ruby red in color, fresh fruit aromatics of mandarin orange, black raspberry and grilled watermelon spring from the glass. On the palate, pretty nuances of rose petal, gardenia and oolong tea mingle with herbal notes of sandalwood, star anise, fresh thyme and fennel seed. The mouthfeel is plush and velvety yet finishes with significant persistence and volume.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Ripe red berries and candied flowers are complicated by suggestions of cinnamon and allspice. Lithe and appealingly sweet on the palate, offering intense raspberry, cherry and spicecake flavors that deepen and spread out with air

Name: Perbacco Nebbiolo
Wine Description: Offers up generous fruit along with menthol, spices and hard candy, showing notable intensity while retaining an essentially mid-weight style. Strong, intense and powerful when young, complex and elegant with the ageing.

Name: Les Allées de Cantemerle Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: This wine’s black cherry and deep garnet color is typical of Bordeaux. Its expressive aromas open up to show very fruity, raspberry notes. In the mouth the wine is immediately accessible, notable for its charm and floral character.

Name: Montagne-Saint-Émilion
Wine Description: Clear, ruby-red color. Fruity, jammy aromas with subtle vanilla notes. Balanced and full-bodied. Soft tannins lead to a harmonious and lasting aftertaste.

Name: Proprietary Red Blend
Wine Description: Opulent aromas black currant, plums and blueberry pie of greet the nose, accompanied by hints of tobacco and leather. The refined yet robust palate is multi-dimensional showcasing flavors of dark berries and vanilla complemented by velveteen gripping tannins, a savory, richly dense mouthfeel and lingering finish.

Name: El Necio Syrah Reserva
Wine Description: This wine has notes of bacon, spice, black cherries, and a touch of floral and smoke. The medium-bodied palate finishes with round tannins.

Name: La Fille du Boucher Réserve Bordeaux
Heritage Reserve Merlot
Wine Description: Merlot has a true varietal voice with aromas of blackberry fruit leather, dusky black cherry and cedar box. Immediate flavors of sarsaparilla and cassis are framed by a kiss of oak developing into sophisticated layers of baker's chocolate and black truffles.

Name: Duc des Nauves Côtes de Bordeaux
Wine Description: It's a balanced and fresh wine with velvety aromas. The mouth is rich with hints of red fruits and smooth tannins. A soft and elegant wine that will ravish your sense

Name: Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This Cabernet has distinct flavors of blackberry, blueberry, and both red and black currants with enticing fragrances of mocha and nutmeg. Subtle notes of chocolate and toasty vanillins add to the richness and length of this bold Cab, and are accompanied by fine grained tannins on a lengthy finish.

Name: Essential Red
Wine Description: A compelling blend of California's finest plantings of Old Vine Zinfandel, Syrah, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petite Sirah, this wine surpasses all expectation for pure enjoyment and approachability. Rich, enticing layers of complexity, starting with that first irresistible sip. Ripe fruit, intense with flavors of boysenberries and sweet cherries. Luscious vanilla, caressing the palate from barrel aging in American and French oak. Juicy and silky throughout, with a finish that lingers of black licorice and spicy pipe tobacco.

Name: Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: Ruby color and a nose that displays bright red fruits with hints of spice. This complexity is carried onto the palate with racy acidity and oak bringing freshness and structure.

Name: Russian River Valley Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has aromas of blackberries, blueberry, and nutmeg are followed by flavors of Bing cherries, wild raspberries, dark plum and allspice. The dense entry is followed by a sweet and juicy mouth feel, supported by acidity, silky tannins and a subtle earthy finish.

Name: Classico
Wine Description: Softly perfumed, the nose shows good ripe fruit notes, an elegant green note and soft spices. The Palate is characterized by elegant fruit concentration, an impressive tannic structure, a silky mouth feel and a long spicy finish.

Name: Sierra de Gredos Granito del Cadalso Garnacha
Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This wine offers buoyant flavors of dark cherries and wild cranberries that are ensued by a silky and satisfying finish, delivering a smile to all admirers.

Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Wine Advocate The 2012 Chianti Classico Riserva Vigna Casi brings a whole new focus to this difficult vintage. Given the lean mouthfeel in the base Chianti Classico, I can only assume that Castelo di Meleto put its best fruit and its best efforts into this single-vineyard Riserva. The wine opens to a pretty dark color and dense concentration with soft tones of cherry fruit, blackberry, spice and leather. This is a soft and penetrating wine, and you can taste the effort and workmanship that went into making it what it is today. Score: 90+, Monica Larner, October 2015 Wine Enthusiast "This opens with aromas of baked plum, toast, grilled herb and a whiff of espresso. The soft, round palate offers up fleshy black cherry, licorice, mocha and a hint of coconut alongside polished tannins. Drink sooner rather than later to capture the juicy fruit flavours." Score: 90, April 2014 Wine Spectator Bright, juicy cherry fruit is matched by chalky tannins in this lively, firm red. Accents of leather and tea add complexity. The finish is moderately long. Best from 2016 through 2023. 1,000 cases made. Score: 89, Bruce Sanderson, 2015

Name: Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Ruby Red, Shiny and Flowing. Floral sensations of violet and fresh berries, followed by light herbal notes. Tannic but no aggressive, well balanced by a clear and marked acidity and a fresh and persistent fruit.

Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Red and purple in colour. On the nose intense bouquet of vanilla, licorice and chocolate. In the mouth round, spicy, elegant and well structured.

Name: Abbinato
Wine Description: This wine is light bodied with a soft tannic structure. It is a modern style light wine, with fruit and vanilla flavors.

Name: Lalande-de-Pomerol
Wine Description: Cassis, earth and graphite notes were mixed with mocha and toast on the nose. Very deep though, and quite lovely. Palate was rich, with tons of cassis, along with more graphite, some herbs and a toss of earth, all nicely balanced. Decent length, nice flavours of cassis, green pepper and some smoky coffee ground.

Name: Lalande-de-Pomerol
Wine Description: Filled with ripe red fruit and soft tannins, this comes from sandy soils and fine gravels.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Intense, clean and shinny color. With aromas that range from a variety of berries like raspberry and strawberry, with hints of cacao and spices. It has a full bodied flavor, with soft acidity and tannins

Name: Ca' del Laito Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore
Estate Merlot
Wine Description: Merlot shows aromas of sweet spices, toasted herbs and minerals while expressing classic flavors of black cherry, chocolate, coffee and vanilla

Name: Biodynamic Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Vibrant, focused and expressive, with flavors of allspice, huckleberry and underbrush, our Cabernet mirrors the terrior of Redwood Valley's complex ecosystem. Graceful tannins sustain a velvety mouthfeel, with subtle violet notes on the finish.

Name: Señorío de P. Peciña Reserva
Wine Description: Intense cherry and an orange, terracotta rim.Smooth vanilla hints with character at retro-olfaction. Leather, tobacco and prune hints.Elegant, ripe fruit with a flavourful body and toffee notes. A long finish.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Deep purple in color and offers powerful aromas of black stone fruits and floral notes. Juicy flavors of plum and blackberry, with a touch of chocolate and vanilla from oak aging lead into a long lingering finish with ripe velvety tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The aroma of this full bodied wine comprises hues of cassis and black forest fruits with hints of black pepper, cloves and nutmeg.

Name: Veraton Garnacha
Wine Description: A wine with an attractive collection of balsamic notes, of chocolate and black fruits, very warm in the mouth and an extremely pleasant finish.
